name: Knife vs Fruit
description:
2018's best knife throwing casual game “Knife vs Fruit”!

"Knife vs Fruit" is a truly fun and exciting knife flipping game. The goal of this game is to hit and stab all the rotating targets; these targets can be fruit, vegetables or yummy desserts. It’s an easy one finger control game, just tap the knives to throw them out. Be careful, if any of your knives overlaps, you fail the level!

Try to hit the coins surrounding fruits to earn them, and you can get cooler knives, swords, and daggers from the shop. You can even get more fruits and amazing backgrounds like wood, grass or polka dots walls.

HOW TO PLAY
• Simply tap the screen to throw the knives out.
• Fruits may rotate clockwise or anticlockwise, and they change speed all the time!
• Every few levels you’ll encounter a “crazy boss challenge”, try to beat him and earn TONS of coins!


FEATURES
• Simple control!
• Clean, minimalist graphics
• Flip your knife to stab the fruits
• Enhance your reaction & targeting skills
• Collect various kinds of cool knives, swords, and daggers!
• Feel achievement with Increased coins by completing more levels
• 1100 challenging levels
• Bonus gift if you calculate enough throws

Can you complete all 1100 levels and become the KNIFE FLIP MASTER?
